modName: Let's get drunk - alcoholic beverages with refraction
summary: 1K retexture for alcoholic beverages with refracting bottles.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b][center][color=#ff0000][size=5]This mod is released ONLY on Nexus. If you see it on other pages it's probably stolen.[/size][/color][/center]

[/b][size=3]This mod is a simple retexture for alcoholic beverages with added refraction. I'm aware that there are a lot of better retextures on Nexus, but I wanted to do that for quite some time already, so here it is. Refracting effect is not too strong, because the stronger I set it, the uglier the bottles looked. Let me know what you think. If you don't like the refraction, you can choose option with normal bottles. Full version contains plugin that changes weight and look of some drinks, and requires Hearthfire DLC. [size=4]
THE MOD DOESN'T CONTAIN RIFTEN SPECIAL DRINKS (THEY ARE IN FUTURE PLANS THOUGH).

Available patches for:[u]
[/u][/size][/size][/size][list]
[*][size=3]CACO[/size]
[*][size=3]Requiem[/size]
[*][size=3]RND[/size]
[/list][size=4][size=3]
I don't know how the mod will look with different ENBs, because I made it using vanilla graphic.

[color=#00ff00]INSTALLATION:[/color]
[/size][/size]Simply install with a mod installer. If for some reason it doesn't work, copy files from "0main" to your data folder. Choose if you want refracting bottles or not and copy files from chosen folder to your Data folder as well.

[size=3]NOT COMPATIBLE with anything that alters alcoholic beverages' meshes or textures.

[size=4][b][color=#ff0000]Version 2.0:[/color][/b][/size]
[size=2]- improved textures
- more transparency
- better refracting effect
- now should look better with ENB[/size]

[color=#ff0000]Version 1.1:[/color]
[size=2]- made refraction effect slightly stronger
- fixed environment maps[/size]

[size=2]If you would like to use any part of this mod, please contact me first. [/size][/size]
author: dailyplanet
